entries.title: Horst Mahler, 89, Dies; Voice of the German Far Left, Then the Far Right

title_detail.value: Horst Mahler, 89, Dies; Voice of the German Far Left, Then the Far Right

entries.summary: As a young lawyer and a Communist revolutionary, he helped start the violent Red Army Faction. Later, he went to prison as a Nazi apologist and Holocaust denier.

summary_detail.value: As a young lawyer and a Communist revolutionary, he helped start the violent Red Army Faction. Later, he went to prison as a Nazi apologist and Holocaust denier.

entries.author: Clay Risen

content.value: Mr. Mahler in prison in 1978. He had been convicted of crimes as a member of the radical left-wing Red Army Faction, which he had helped found.
